title: 820-01041 Mac 2018 Restart at loading
message:
Hi,

I am working with above Touch Bar  macbook and when turn on, Apple logo appearing and progress bar goes for about 10-15 seconds, then screen goes off and fan works very fast. CPU is getting very hot too. Where should I check?
After few seconds again apple logo appear and goes it as a cycle.

title: 820-01041 Mac 2018 Restart at loading
message:
Start with DFU revive/restore.

Any history available?

title: 820-01041 Mac 2018 Restart at loading
message:
I didn't try DFU revive/restore since customer needs data badly. Any way to recover data first? Don't see any lifeboat port in this model.

No water damage or any other burn marks etc.

Also forget to mention that CPU is very fast when turning on.

title: 820-01041 Mac 2018 Restart at loading
message: Try Target Disk Mode to backup the data.

title: 820-01041 Mac 2018 Restart at loading
message:
Revive option in DFU does NOT delete any data.
Restore wipes internal SSD.
